name: IBM Cloud Private highly-available cluster
description: This template will deploy IBM Cloud Private in a high availability configuration

metadata.displayName: IBM Cloud Private highly-available cluster in AWS
metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy an HA topology of IBM Cloud Private into the Amazon cloud

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description: 3 master nodes, 3 proxy nodes, 3 worker nodes, 3 management nodes, 3 VA nodes

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Cloud Private - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSBS6K/product_welcome_cloud_private.html
3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
